attributes.action: Stop Adult-Only Groups Taking Over Family Firework Events
attributes.additional_details: Families are being pushed out of events advertised as child-friendly. On “Family Days,” large adult groups are overcrowding spaces, pushing past children, and creating unsafe environments. We want to protect spaces where children can enjoy fireworks safely.
attributes.background: We want guidance so that events advertising Family Firework Days are for families only. Separate days should be offered for adults without children. This will create a safer, calmer environment where children can enjoy the display without overcrowding or unsafe behaviour.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about ticketing of and access to firework events are a matter for event organisers, not the UK Government or Parliament.
